item.title: Introducing flxr - an R package to retrieve movie data
item.description: I am happy to say that Iâ€™ve created my first R package: flxr. This package is designed to scrape basic data about movies. It can be installed using the devtools package: devtools::install_github("markroepke/flxr") library(flxr) The flxr package retrieves information about movies using only a user-provided movie title. For example, if we wanted to find the director of The Godfather, we could use the flx_mov_director() function: flx_mov_director(movie = "The Godfather") ## Returning movie director for The Godfather: ## [1] "Francis Ford Coppola" You will notice the message above specifying that the director for The Godfather is being returned.
